entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
